description: Manage construction project data across clients, contacts, proposals, estimates, schedules, tasks, and subcontractors. Streamline creating, updating, and retrieving records with paginated lists and validation. Maintain accountability with audit trails and safely archive records without losing history.

capabilities.name: list_clients
capabilities.description: Retrieve a paginated list of clients

capabilities.name: create_client
capabilities.description: Create a new client record

capabilities.name: list_contacts
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of contacts

capabilities.name: create_contact
capabilities.description: Create a new contact

capabilities.name: list_proposals
capabilities.description: Get a minimal list of proposals with optional project filtering. Returns only name, id, and projectId for each proposal. Use discover or search to find proposals and get full details.

capabilities.name: list_estimates
capabilities.description: Get a minimal list of estimates with optional project filtering. Returns only name, id, and projectId for each estimate. Use get_estimates to retrieve full details for a specific project's estimates.

capabilities.name: list_action_items
capabilities.description: Get a minimal list of action items with optional project filtering. Returns only name (title), id, and projectId for each action item. Use get_action_item to retrieve full details for a specific action item.

capabilities.name: get_action_item
capabilities.description: Get full details for a specific action item by ID

capabilities.name: create_action_item
capabilities.description: Create a new Action Item. Can be Generic (ActionTypeId=3), Cost Change (ActionTypeId=1), or Schedule Change (ActionTypeId=2). For Cost/Schedule changes, you MUST include the corresponding nested object with all required fields.

capabilities.name: add_action_item_comment
capabilities.description: Add a comment to an action item

capabilities.name: assign_action_item_supervisor
capabilities.description: Assign a supervisor to an action item

capabilities.name: list_projects
capabilities.description: Get a minimal list of all projects. Returns only name, id, and projectId for each project. Use get_project to retrieve full details for a specific project.

capabilities.name: get_project
capabilities.description: Get full project details by project ID

capabilities.name: get_schedule
capabilities.description: Get full schedule data for a specific project

capabilities.name: list_schedules
capabilities.description: Get a minimal list of schedules with optional project filtering. Returns only name, id, and projectId for each schedule.

capabilities.name: get_estimates
capabilities.description: Get full estimate data for a specific project

capabilities.name: discover
capabilities.description: Discover comprehensive project data by searching for a project and retrieving all related information including project details, financials (estimates, job balances, cost variance), schedules, and action items - all in one unified JSON response

capabilities.name: get_financials
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive financial data for a project including job balances and cost variance

capabilities.name: get_transactions
capabilities.description: Get transaction list for a project with optional date range filtering

capabilities.name: find_project
capabilities.description: Search for projects by name, client name, or other attributes. Returns matching projects with basic info.

capabilities.name: find_estimate
capabilities.description: Search for estimates and estimate categories. Can search across all estimates or within a specific project.

capabilities.name: find_schedule
capabilities.description: Search for schedules and construction tasks. Can search across all schedules or within a specific project.

capabilities.name: find_proposal
capabilities.description: Search for proposals by proposal number, title, or description. Can optionally filter by project.

capabilities.name: find_action_items
capabilities.description: Search for action items by title or description. Can optionally filter by project.

capabilities.name: search
capabilities.description: Generic search tool that can search across multiple entity types with optional filtering by project.
